record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="category" and term="category table" and format.name="category" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: category
record.format.name: category

brief.brief: Information pertaining to Incident category defaults and general information, including forms for each action, alert intervals and expressions, whether the Category is considered for availability, and default assignment groups are kept for each category.

detail.detail: Use the Create New Category function command (createcat or F10 from the Incident Management Menu.) to add new categories requiring new forms.
